data.author: Kevin Kruse
data.quote: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.

data.author: Amella Earhart
data.quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.

data.author: Bo Bennett
data.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

data.author: Veronica Roth
data.quote: Fear doesnâ€™t shut you down; it wakes you up.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.

data.author: Virgil
data.quote: They can conquer who believe they can.

data.author: Walt Whitman
data.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.

data.author: W. C. Fields
data.quote: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. There's no point in being a damn fool about it.

data.author: W. Clement Stone
data.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

data.author: Abraham Lincoln
data.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.

data.author: Thomas Edison
data.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time

data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we're curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths
